bill.constitutionalAuthorityStatementText: [Congressional Record Volume 166, Number 128 (Tuesday, July 21, 2020)][House]From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]By Mr. PANETTA:H.R. 7712.Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuantto the following:Article I, Section 8, clause 18[Page H3612]

item.title: William M. (Mac) Thornberry National Defense Authorization Act for Fiscal Year 2021

latestAction.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

item.title: National Defense Authorization Act for Fiscal Year 2021

item.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.

summary.text:
Special Operations and International Security Education Act

This bill prohibits the Department of Defense (DOD) from eliminating, divesting, downsizing, or reorganizing specified programs of the National Defense University until DOD issues a related report to Congress.

bill.title: Special Operations and International Security Education Act

item.title: Special Operations and International Security Education Act
Special Operations and International Security Education Act
To prohibit the Secretary of Defense from eliminating or otherwise modifying certain programs of the National Defense University pending an assessment of such programs.

latestAction.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.

dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.
dublinCore.dc:contributor: Congressional Research Service, Library of Congress
dublinCore.dc:description: This file contains bill summaries and statuses for federal legislation. A bill summary describes the most significant provisions of a piece of legislation and details the effects the legislative text may have on current law and federal programs. Bill summaries are authored by the Congressional Research Service (CRS) of the Library of Congress. As stated in Public Law 91-510 (2 USC 166 (d)(6)), one of the duties of CRS is "to prepare summaries and digests of bills and resolutions of a public general nature introduced in the Senate or House of Representatives". For more information, refer to the User Guide that accompanies this file.
